title: Ad Conversion
description: Fired when a user completes a desired action attributed to an ad.

conversionType.description: The type of conversion action completed.

conversionValue.description: The monetary value of the conversion.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

campaignId.description: Unique identifier for the advertising campaign.

creativeId.description: Unique identifier for the ad creative.

attributionModel.description: The attribution model used to credit the conversion to the ad.
